title: 85/477/EEC: Council Decision of 21 October 1985 amending Decision 78/476/EEC on the equivalence of checks on practices for the maintenance of varieties carried out in third countries
header:
COUNCIL  DECISION
of 21 October 1985
amending Decision 78/476/EEC on the equivalence of checks on practices for the maintenance of varieties carried out in third countries
(85/477/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
With effect from 1 July 1985, the following new item is inserted in the Annex to Decision 78/476/EEC:
1.2.3.4 //   //   //   //   // 1  // 2  // 3  // 4  //   //  //   //   // Reference No  // Country  // Authority responsible for carrying out checks  // Species  //   //   //  //   // 01  // Australia (AUS)  // Commonwealth Department of Primary Industry, Canberra  // Agricultural plant species referred to in Directives 66/401/EEC and 69/208/EEC  //   //  //   // Vegetable species referred to in Directive 70/458/EEC 152, 8. 6. 1978, p. 19. (5) OJ No L 275, 8. 10. 1983, p. 18.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 21 October 1985.
For the Council
The President
M. FISCHBACH  //   //   //   //
(1) OJ No L 225, 12. 10. 1970, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 341, 16. 12. 1980, p. 27. (3) OJ No L 225, 12. 10. 1970, p. 7. (4) OJ No L
